message.body: We're hunkering down in j's apartment in BK! This is getting pretty crazy over here. How are you guys in Boston???
We are fine. Yes promise you won't go outside! It sounds rough. We are all getting our numbers read by my classmate who does numerology and is crazy. I call him the prophet
Omg you told me about him. That sounds pretty awesome!
Still have water and power. Wind gusts getting stronger tho
It is. You guys have water
Well stay in touch!! Please we are thinking if you. We should also Skype. Do you guys want your numbers read

Hahah I'd say yes but I think I'm already freaking Jonathan out!! I'll be on gchat as long as we have power for. Keep us posted. Sending you good vibes. Make sure your fridges are on their coldest settings, etc :)
